classmeta.shortdesc: An object that represents a group of fonts with varying sizes.
classmeta.desc: A PangoFontFace object represents a group of fonts with the same family, weight, slant, stretch and width but varying sizes. A list of font faces can be retrieved from a PangoFontFamily object using the list_faces method.

method.desc: This method returns a PangoFontDescription object with the family, style, variant, weight and stretch information entered. The size will be unset.

method.shortdesc: Returns the name of the font face.
method.desc: This method returns a string representing this font face. The name is unique among all faces in the family and is suitable for displaying to users.

method.shortdesc: Returns a list of available font sizes.
method.desc: Returns a list of available font face sizes in pango units.
